payload.title: Fix ID generator inconsistencies and test failures
payload.description: Resolve inconsistencies between id_generator.ts implementation and its tests. Fix property name mismatch (slug vs slugOrRandom) and improve validation to reject invalid prefixes like 'badprefix'.
payload.notes: Fixed two main issues: property naming inconsistency and overly permissive validation. Added strict prefix validation with VALID_PREFIXES array.
